snippet: President Obama’s determination to move deliberately and line up support from allies before confronting threats means that he has sometimes appeared to be a spectator to events outside his control.
abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama sticks to his deliberative approach as crises continue to mount on his watch; his determination to line up support from allies before confronting threats, whether in the Ukraine or from Islamist State terrorists, means that sometimes he has appeared to be a spectator to events outside his control.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s determination to move deliberately and line up support from allies before confronting threats means that he has sometimes appeared to be a spectator to events outside his control.

headline.main: As Crises Pile Up, a President Sticks to His Deliberative Approach
headline.print_headline: As Crises Pile Up, a President Sticks to His Deliberative Approach

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
